title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 20 May 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:12 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
00:15 <sburjan`> has quit  
00:15 <sburjan\_> is now known as <sburjan`>  
01:49 <jvdrean> has quit  
02:09 <rrodriguez> has quit

02:47 <Shaddox> has quit

06:34 <jssol> has joined #xwiki  
07:03 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki

08:19 <sburjan`> has quit  
08:19 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
08:21 <slugz> has quit  
08:52 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:54 <jssol> has quit  
08:56 <vmassol> sburjan`: good morning, btw when you get time (it can wait tomorrow! :)) could you fill n/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise41M1 with tested browsers and DBs (it's missing the tested DB section ATM)?  
09:15 <+sburjan`> hello vmassol. Doing it now since I've only tested the standard distribution  
09:15 <+sburjan`> hsqldb  
09:18 <+sburjan`> done  
09:18 <+sburjan`> oh, bot is back :D  
09:29 <vmassol> thanks  
09:30 <+sburjan`> I have a question. I'ev managed to get started the IE8 job to run on the Jenkins agent, and I see 3 tests are failing. Do you recommend to exclude those tests or to leave it like that as a reminder to anyone who wants to help fixing the IE8 tests ?  
09:34 <vmassol> has quit  
09:43 <qwebirc53945> has joined #xwiki  
10:01 <sburjan`> has quit  
10:01 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
10:11 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:23 <qwebirc53945> #name jssol  
10:23 <qwebirc53945> has quit  
10:24 <jssol> has joined #xwiki  
10:26 <jssol> hello friends, I was hoping someone can help me. I've been trying to get at this for a number of hours, but it seems when I clone xwiki-platform some files are not downloaded. eg. xwiki-platform-tools and everything after xwiki-platform-extensions (alphabetically). When i download via browser i can get everything, but then that stops me from being to add . since it will add all new files that didn't get cloned  
10:27 <jssol> anyone have any idea how to resolve this?  
10:28 <+sburjan`> are you using windows ?  
10:29 <jssol> i am, is this the issue  
10:31 <+sburjan`> as far as I know there is still a long path issue in windows. If you want to do it on windows, I think you'll have to use cygwin, but I am not sure this will fix your issue  
10:32 <jssol> ok, i was having problem with ubuntu earlier, i guess I will try that again. thanks for the heads up  
10:34 <+sburjan`> cloning works on ubuntu withour a problem  
10:37 <jssol> has quit  
10:44 <vmassol> has quit  
10:50 <jssol> has joined #xwiki  
10:50 <jssol> windows seemed to be the problem. thank you for the help!  
11:04 <+sburjan`> no problem :)  
11:07 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:21 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki

12:52 <qwebirc21821> Hello, anyone here?

13:41 <noy> has joined #xwiki  
13:44 <noy> Hello all, I have a problem with xWiki 4.1 (Standalnoe install, with tomcat6 and mysql over SLES)  
13:44 <noy> JAVA is eating up 4 cpus with 1 user connected, this is the log:  
13:44 <noy> http://pastebin.com/KKkW5mpx  
13:45 <noy> couldn't really find anything on google \ mailing lists \ forums, so I guessed I must have done something wrong along the way somewhere..

21:38 <jssol> has joined #xwiki  
22:13 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
22:50 <vmassol> has quit  
22:55 <slugz> has joined #xwiki  
23:03 <qwebirc84308> has joined #xwiki  
23:03 <qwebirc84308> Hello, anyone about?  
23:03 <@cjd> somewhat, what's on your mind?  
23:04 <qwebirc84308> besides the xwiki cloud. are there any other host that can easily set up xwiki platform?  
23:05 <@cjd> you mean a company which hosts xwiki servers?  
23:05 <qwebirc84308> the second question, i have set up xwiki enterprise and wondering how easy is it to share the database information between other xwiki enterprises and xwiki platform?  
23:05 <qwebirc84308> yes  
23:05 <@cjd> because you can host it comfortably on a server or vps with about 2GB of ram.  
23:06 <@cjd> 1GB is enough but it's a little bit tight  
23:07 <@cjd> xwiki.org uses around 300 to 500MB of heap space.  
23:07 <@cjd> I don't understand the second question.  
23:08 <jvdrean> has quit  
23:17 <rrodriguez> has quit  
23:22 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
23:48 <qwebirc84308> I am using XWiki Enterprise and would like to share this database with XWiki Platform, how easy is this?  
23:49 <qwebirc84308> 1-2 GBS of hosting space?  
23:50 <@cjd> 1GB is fine for small to medium wikis, 2GB is big enough that you should never be concerned about memory.  
23:51 <@cjd> note that Enterprise and Platform are internal names for parts of the code. Enterprise is built on top of Platform.  
23:51 <jssol> hi, i've been trying to build xwiki from source, but i keep getting stuck at workspace-ui. this is what maven spits out, can anyone help me decrpyt this error  
23:51 <@cjd> that is to say, there is no way to install just Platform without something built on top of it  
23:51 <jssol>  Failed to execute goal org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-tool-xmldoc-update-plugin:4.1-SNAPSHOT:attach (attach-template-features-xar) on project xwiki-platform-workspace-ui: Error while attaching the file [/home/jssolichin/xwik/xwiki-platform/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-workspace/xwiki-platform-workspace-ui/target/template-features/workspace-template-features.xar] on document [WorkspaceManager.Install.xml]: Failed to load compon  
23:52 <jssol> where jssolichin is my user  
23:52 <@cjd> jssol: can you paste the end of the backscroll to a pastebin?  
23:53 <jssol> sure, sorry about that. Should i also do -e or -x  
23:53 <@cjd> just paste what you have and I'll look  
23:54 <@cjd> if you do -e it might help but that will take more time ofc  
23:54 <jssol> http://pastebin.com/UuP7aZYU  
23:54 <jssol> thank you  
23:54 <@cjd> sometimes you do -e and maven is like haha it failed... somewhere :D  
23:56 <jssol> this is with -e http://pastebin.com/azQGHDNc  
23:56 <jssol> first time using maven, so all of this seems like that as well unfortunately aha  
23:56 <qwebirc84308> Okay, but i use xwiki enterprise as a standalone and xwiki platform as a web app right?  
23:57 <@cjd> nah, enterprise comes in 2 flavors for standalone and webapp  
23:58 <@cjd> must be getting DoS again  
23:58 <@cjd> protip: ezcrypt.it == pastebin without the ads  
23:59 <jssol> interesting, pastebin works for me  
23:59 <jssol> https://ezcrypt.it/Ua5n#IcoIsYJ9kyM8Wn8uMRwTz3qu  
23:59 <jssol> and this is cool, never used this one before  
23:59 <jssol> this is with -e https://ezcrypt.it/Va5n#VucLVy4XOal31hbPeP3heg64  
23:59 <@cjd> have you checked out commons and rendering?
